## Variable Description for `ice_cream` data.frame

The following describes the variables in the `ice_cream` data.frame.


- `flavors`
List of flavors

- `price`
Price of the ice cream

- `size`
Size of ice cream

- `id`
household id

- `size`
household size

- `used coupon`
if coupon was used or not

- `coupon per item`
how much the coupon was

- `region``
Where it was (Central, West, South, East)

- `married`
If they are married or not

- `race`
The race of the household
